<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Distracting Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=555) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 183 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[scoundrel racket](/Rackets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your Feints are far more distracting than normal, drawing your foes’ attention and allowing you and your allies to take greater advantage. While a creature is flat-footed by your Feint, it also takes a –2 circumstance penalty to Perception checks and Reflex saves.
name: Distracting Feint
